metadata.Title: CVE-2020-15647 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: A Content Provider in Firefox for Android allowed local files accessible by the browser to be read by a remote webpage, leading to sensitive data disclosure, including cookies for other origins. This vulnerability affects Firefox for < Android.

notes.Note: tyhicks> mozjs contains a copy of the SpiderMonkey JavaScript engine mdeslaur> specific to Android

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
